message.body: Happy valentines day! Thank you for the poem; don't forget to check your mail when you get home
Thanks for the beautiful song; it made me smile after a long day yesterday!
Yay! Glad you liked it, ill have to record it again now that im not stuffy. When do you leave for work? Can i ride down town w u?
Sorry I missed you-I'm already at work; I had to walk because it's so nice out!
